snippet: Doing the right thing with money involves recognition and discipline, say two leading researchers in the growing field of behavioral economics.
abstract: Research in the growing field of behavioral economics shows that individual investors can overcome tendencies toward making wrong choices with their investments, although doing so requires recognition and discipline.
lead_paragraph: Doing the right thing with money involves recognition and discipline, say two leading researchers in the growing field of behavioral economics.

headline.seo: Learning to Mistrust Your Financial Instincts
headline.main: Learning to Mistrust Your Financial Instincts
headline.print_headline: Learning to Mistrust Your Financial Instincts
